name: Spirit of Resistance
description:
WE SHALL NOT LET THE LIGHT FADE

THE FLAMES OF TRUTH SHALL BURN FOREVER

First with the members of the Torchbearers to survive the global Totalitarian Oppression! Travel around the world and play Mines... PLACE BEACONS AND HACK STUFF. Meet the (almost) adorable members of the resistance, and what ever you do, don't ask about that album.

Weird mix of globe trotting and minesweeping gameplay with a bunch of dialogue thrown in here and there. Also, it's 4 am and I have no idea what I'm writing.

Warning: May contain politics and Finnish expletives. 

Music by DOS-88 (https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library)
